authors.affiliation: Massachusetts General Hospital; Harvard Medical School

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3hig8","text":"Protocol for obtaining single cell suspension of murine trachea.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"1uip3","text":"PBS - Phosphate-Buffered Saline (10X) pH 7.4, RNase-free (Thermo Fisher
Scientific; cat. no: AM9625)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6f4jc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fs6uf","text":"1x PBS Buffer for washes and cell suspension","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"be3n6","text":"5ml  Phosphate-Buffered
Saline (10X) pH 7.4, RNase-free (Thermo Fisher Scientific; cat. no: AM9625).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rm6b","text":"45ml Invitrogen water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cee70","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"feq54","text":"Important: Do not use DPBS or other PBS buffers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"trah","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5iai1","text":"0.5% BSA in 1x PBS solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9e0v","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cilpd","text":"Dissolve 0.250mg BSA in 1xPBS solution above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhino","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6u7ds","text":"DNase I (50,000x) 50,000 U/ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45k9","text":"
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eu802","text":"Papain Stock Solution (2X)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"orau","text":"40u/ml Papain (lyophilized, Worthington-Biochem, cat# LS001220) in EBSS (has Mg
and Ca).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1qp2","text":"Dissolve 120 mg papain in 50 ml EBSS by rocking at room temp for 20min. Filter using
syringe filters in the hood and aliquot in the hood in 1 ml tubes. Freeze at -20*C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1d0pi","text":"
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aj57s","text":"Activation Stock Solution (2X)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqcgn","text":"0.067 mM beta-mercaptoethanol, 1.1 mM EDTA, 5.5 mM Cysteine-HCl, in EBSS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhqm2","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75aij","text":"Combine:
110ul of 500 mM EDTA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1tl6","text":"66ul 50 mM beta-mercaptoethanol (deli fridge in tissue culture room)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dc5vi","text":"0.048g ysteine-HCl.H2O (powder above Brian's bench).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bld34","text":"50ml EBSS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94rib","text":"
(Changes color to orange)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3uj1o","text":"Freeze at -20*C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vpb0","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae0m7","text":" RBC Lysis buffer (commercial, ThermoFisher Scientific, 00-4333-57)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":1,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68gk0","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t17h","text":"Enzyme dissociation mix #2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ednn8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2u5s","text":"25ul of 70kU/ml Collagenase I (in DMEM/ringers) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28h0o","text":"25ul of 50kU/ml hyluronidase (in DMEM/ringers)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h597","text":"50ul of 7.5kU/ml DNAse (in DMEM/ringers)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ab6m5","text":"120ul of 2.5U/ml dispase (in DMEM/ringers)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6tchs","text":"400ul of 2X papain (40 u/ml) (in EBSS)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2f4i","text":"QC to 5 ml of DMEM (has Ca and Mg, so good to use).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ss3d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83ebe","text":"Note:
Can scale down from 5ml for the number of tracheas processed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em2p","text":"
100% FBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":1,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpjn6","text":"Thaw in advance in water bath.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ah2n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fn9kj","text":"DMSO ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crkie","text":"

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fo4gc","text":"Perfuse lungs via right ventricle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2gr20","text":"Dissect out trachea and lungs and place in HBSS on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2uvsh","text":"Euthanize mice by CO2 method.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3kkst","text":"Clean up the tracheas under the dissection microscope.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bgc7j","text":"Bi-sect the tracheas along the ventral side.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33r54","text":" Incubate each trachea in 500ul enzyme dissociation mix #1 for 30min with rotation  at 37*C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h58j","text":"\nEnzyme dissociation mix #1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":1,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jasv","text":"1ml of papain","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9fhnm","text":"1ml of activation solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lvg6","text":"20ul Dnase I ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f6alk","text":"Cut off the tip of p1000 tip and pipet trachea up and down 10 times. Should get stringy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fcc38","text":"Spin down for 5 min at 2000g. This will pellet both single cells and the husk.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58d6b","text":"Using a pipet (not the vacuum), remove as much supernatant as possible without being a hero.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7v7ab","text":"Resuspend cells and husk in 500ul enzyme mix #2 per trachea for 20 minutes at 37C with rocking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36cvd","text":"\nEnzyme dissociation mix #2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":1,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3cpvt","text":"25ul of 70kU/ml Collagenase I (in DMEM/ringers) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffn4b","text":"25ul of 50kU/ml hyluronidase (in DMEM/ringers)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1i65","text":"50ul of 7.5kU/ml DNAse (in DMEM/ringers)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9p9ml","text":"120ul of 2.5U/ml dispase (in DMEM/ringers)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45vpn","text":"400ul of 2X papain (40 u/ml) (in EBSS)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"accm1","text":"QC to 5 ml of DMEM (has Ca and Mg, so good to use).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"20nfb","text":"Cut off the tip of p1000 tip and pipet trachea up and down 10 times. Husk will be mostly gone.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24q9o","text":"Spike in 55ul FBS for 10% FBS final concentration to inactivate papain and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4jqsl","text":"Strain cells through 100um strainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f4ipe","text":"Centrifuge at 8000 × g for 2.5 min, discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b88hl","text":"Add 300 uL of RBC lysis buffer per trachea and incubate for 60s on the bench.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"pc4h","text":"Add 1 mL of EBSS to stop the lysing, centrifuge at 8000 × g for 2.5 min, discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6clki","text":"Resuspend with 200 uL of 0.5% BSA in PBS. Keep on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9mdm","text":"Count two samples each per trachea. We routinely recover 250,000-350,000 cells with this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8dvj","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bi1g6","text":"Split each tracheal sample into 50,000 cell aliquots, according to the cell counts determined above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qoml","text":"Keep one aliquot on ice for Andrew to pick up. This is the scRNA-seq sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"832kr","text":"For the remaining 3-4 aliquots, spin down at 8000 × g for 5 min, discard the supernatant and resuspend in 90% FBS, 10% DMSO and freeze at -80*C. These are the scMS samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ocfi","text":"Prepare according to manufacturer's protocol:   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"to4v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"","id":398486,"original_name":"CG000204_ChromiumNextGEMSingleCell3_v3.1_Rev_D.pdf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nfeyb66fp.pdf"}}}}

title: MGH Harvard SenNet Processing murine trachea for paired single cell RNA-seq and mass spec
title_html: MGH Harvard SenNet Processing murine trachea for paired single cell RNA-seq and mass spec
